entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Princeton Airport 04:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: ESE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Overcast. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
